MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH1 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Bumpers Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 07.15am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.05am on 28th April 2021.
